attributes.action: To please find a shelter for the homeless people. It's freezing cold outside.
attributes.additional_details: I have been a homeless person and even now I'm kind of homeless, because I'm staying at someone's house whilst I'm working to help in the house. I've tried every means for a place but I can't. So imagine these people who don't have the means to help themselves. Please consider.
attributes.background: At this time of the year it's really cold outside and I plead to the government to consider a shelter rather than sending these homeless people to church shelter that some can't get help from them. Please find a hall or something in each borough to house them during this time before they start dying
